body.title: 1. Visesyādhīnavagga
body.gathalast: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
body.gatha1: Sobhanaṃ ruciraṃ sādhu, manuññaṃ cāru sundaraṃ;
body.gathalast: Vaggu manoramaṃ kantaṃ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṃ.
body.gatha1: Bhaddaṃ vāmañca kalyāṇaṃ, manāpaṃ laddhakaṃ subhaṃ;
Mukhyo padhānaṃ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṃ;
body.gathalast: Paṇītaṃ paramaṃ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
Sīha kuñjara saddūlā,dī tu samāsagā pume.
Iṭṭhaṃ tu subhagaṃ hajjaṃ, dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ piyaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tucchañca rittakaṃ suññaṃ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
body.gathalast: Mejjhaṃ pūtaṃ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
body.gatha1: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
body.gathalast: Brahā mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, visālaṃ puthulaṃ puthu.
body.gatha1: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṃ thūlañca pīvaraṃ;
body.gathalast: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṃ nicitaṃ bhave.
body.gatha1: Sabbaṃ samatta makhilaṃ, nikhilaṃ sakalaṃ tathā;
Bhūri pahutaṃ pacuraṃ, bhiyyo sambahulaṃ bahu;
Parosatādī te, yesaṃ, paraṃ mattaṃ satādito;
body.gathalast: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ khuddaṃ, thoka mappaṃ kisaṃ tanu.
Sakāsaṃ antikaṃ ñattaṃ, dūraṃ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
body.gatha1: Nirantaraṃ ghanaṃ sandaṃ, viraḷaṃ pelavaṃ tanu;
body.gathalast: Athā yataṃ dīgha matho, nittalaṃ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṃ.
body.gatha1: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
body.gathalast: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
body.gatha1: Aḷāraṃ vellitaṃ vaṅkaṃ, kuṭilaṃ jimha kuñcitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
Lahu sallahukaṃ cātha, saṅkhyātaṃ gaṇitaṃ mitaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tiṇhaṃ tu tikhiṇaṃ tibbaṃ, caṇḍaṃ uggaṃ kharaṃ bhave;
body.gathalast: Thāvarojaṅgamā añño, lolaṃ tu cañcalaṃ calaṃ.
body.gatha1: Kurūraṃ kaṭhinaṃ daḷhaṃ, niṭṭhuraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ bhave;
Jighaññaṃ carimaṃ pubbaṃ, tva’ggaṃ paṭhama mādi so;
Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
body.gathalast: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṃ tu niraggalaṃ.
body.gatha1: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
body.gathalast: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṃ, sambādho tu ca saṃkaṭaṃ.
body.gatha1: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
body.gathalast: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
body.gatha1: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
body.gathalast: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
body.gatha1: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
body.gathalast: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
body.gatha1: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
body.gathalast: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
body.gatha1: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu calajjālutu ca lajjavā ;
body.gathalast: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
body.gatha1: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
body.gathalast: Vācālobahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
body.gatha1: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṃ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
body.gathalast: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
body.gatha1: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṃ kuthitaṃ bhave;
Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
body.gathalast: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṃ tu ca tejitaṃ.
body.gatha1: Pattabbaṃ gamma māpajjaṃāsajjaṃ , pakkaṃ pariṇataṃ samā;
body.gathalast: Veṭhitaṃ tu valayitaṃ, ruddhaṃ saṃvuta māvutaṃ.
body.gatha1: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṃ dhanitaṃ pyatha;
Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
body.gathalast: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
Bhaṭṭhaṃ tu galitaṃ pannaṃ, cutañca dhaṃsitaṃ bhave.
Anvesitaṃ gavesitaṃ, laddhaṃ tu patta muccate.
Pālitaṃ atha ossaṭṭhaṃ, cattaṃ hīnaṃ samujjhitaṃ.
body.title: 2. Saṃkiṇṇavagga
body.gatha1: Ñeyyaṃ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
body.gatha2: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṃtu suddhakammani;
body.gatha1: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṃ, tappanaṃ tu ca pīṇanaṃ;
Ninnimittaṃ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
Jīraṇaṃ jāni tāṇaṃ tu, rakkhaṇaṃ pamitippamā;
Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Majjhanhikomajjhantiko tu majjhanho, vemattaṃ tu ca nānatā.
body.gatha1: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṃjāgariyo , pavāho tu pavatti ca;
body.gathalast: Kiccaṃ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
body.gatha1: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
body.title: 3. Anekatthavagga
body.gathalast: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
Pamāṇe ca pasaṃsāyaṃ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
body.gatha1: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
body.gathalast: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
body.gatha1: Sevito yena yo niccaṃ, tatthāpi visayosiyā;
body.gathalast: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
body.gatha1: Varo devādikādevādito iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
body.gathalast: Mekhalāyaṃ matā kacchā, kacchovutto latāya ca.
Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṃ.
Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
body.gatha1: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṃvaṇṇe ca paccaye;
body.gathalast: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
body.gatha1: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṃ madane rate;
Vuddhiyaṃ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṃ;
Ārammaṇe ca saṃsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
Sāmaṃvedantare sāntve, taṃ pīte sāmale tisu;
Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṃ;
body.gathalast: Uḷārotīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
Saṅkhātu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
body.gatha1: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sāyoni so ;
body.gathalast: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṃ, velārāsimhi bhāsitā.
Rāge tu mānasocittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṃ.
body.gatha1: Mūlaṃbhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
body.gathalast: Apadesonimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
body.gatha1: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attāparama’ttani;
body.gathalast: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṃthambhasmiṃ , samūhe balasajjane.
body.gatha1: Pakkhokāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamotha ca;
body.gathalast: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
body.gatha1: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
body.gathalast: Aṃse sippe kalākāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
Sunisāyaṃ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhūmatā.
body.gatha1: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṃ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sūlaṃtu nitthiyaṃ heti, bhede saṃku rujāsu ca.
Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo,kappamhi yugale yugaṃ.
body.gatha1: Kaṇḍonitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
body.gathalast: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅgamuccate.
Sassate ca dhuvotīsu, dhuvaṃtakke ca nicchite.
body.gatha1: Hare sivo, sivaṃbhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṃ vanedhane ;
body.gathalast: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
body.gatha1: Kumāroyuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
Paṇovetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṃvuttaṃ dvaye pyatha;
body.gathalast: Dabbaṃbhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
body.gatha1: Māse jeṭṭho,tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
body.gathalast: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo,so pasatthatare tisu.
body.gatha1: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
Samāvasse, samokheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
body.gathalast: Rattaṃtu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
body.gatha1: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
body.gathalast: Utubhede tu sisiro,hime so sītale tisu.
body.gatha1: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
body.gathalast: Rājātu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpokumbhe ca dissati.
Vajjabhede ca vita taṃ,taṃ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṃ.
body.gatha1: Sārobale thiraṃse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
body.gathalast: Vāḷotu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
Sote tu savanaṃvuttaṃ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
body.gatha1: Tīsu pato paretoca, mate ca petayonije;
Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayokathito tha ca;
body.gathalast: Pattaṃpakkhe dale, patto,bhājane so gate tisu.
Samūhe paṭalaṃnetta, roge vuttaṃ chadimhi ca.
Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṃ, saddhāca paccaye.
Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
body.gatha1: Gimhe ghammo nidāghoca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
body.gathalast: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
body.gatha1: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṃ paṭipādanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Atha kambumato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṃ gahaṇī’tthiyaṃ.
Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṃyame ca yamobhave.
body.gatha1: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṃ;
body.gathalast: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tamamanitthiyaṃ.
body.gatha1: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
Rukkhodumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
body.gathalast: Uppattiyaṃ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
body.gatha1: Vede ca mantane manto, mantāpaññāya muccate;
Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo,tibbamhi so tisu;
Kallaṃ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesuyuttadakkhesu tīsu taṃ;
Kapotopakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiyesāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye ;
body.gathalast: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṃ mihite sitaṃ.
body.gatha1: Thiyaṃ pajāpatidāre, brahme māre sure pume;
body.gathalast: Sakkoinde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
body.gatha1: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asitopume;
body.gathalast: Pāṇihatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ mato.
body.gatha1: Tīsu pītaṃhalidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgoca rañjane mato;
body.gathalast: Dānaṃcāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
body.gatha1: Pakkaṃ phalamhi, taṃ nāsu, mmukhenāsamukhe pariṇate tisu;
Vaṭṭoparibbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
body.gathalast: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko,so kuṭile tisu.
Vijjāvede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṃ.
Tīsu luddokurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
body.gatha1: Kaṭṭhaṃdārumhi, taṃ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
Bhuvane ca jane loko,moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
Sūraṃ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍotu muggare dame;
body.gathalast: Bhāgye vidhividhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
Gehe vasativāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
body.gatha1: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samitisaṅgame;
body.gathalast: Vittitose vedanāyaṃ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
Bhūbhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
body.gatha1: Gottaṃnāme ca vaṃse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṃ;
Tapodhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṃ;
Vanaṃarañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
Byāpe asuddhe saṃkiṇṇo, bhabbaṃyogye ca bhāvini;
Subhe sādhumhi bhaddotha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
body.gathalast: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṃtu cuṇṇitepi ca.
Mālyaṃtu pupphe taddāme, vāhotu sakaṭe haye.
Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latāsākhāya valliyaṃ.
body.gatha1: Labbhaṃyutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṃmataṃ;
body.gathalast: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhūniccappabhūsu so.
Nettiṃse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambotu dume caye.
Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṃpāpe ca kaddame.
Bale pabhāve vīriyaṃ, tejotesu ca dittiyaṃ.
body.gatha1: Thiyaṃ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
body.gathalast: Kusumaṃthīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
body.gatha1: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddotu luddakepi ca;
body.gathalast: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṃtu phalake tace.
Sattāyaṃ bhavanaṃgehe, lese tu khalite chalaṃ.
body.gatha1: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho,migādo chagale pasu;
body.gathalast: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullokhudde ca uddhane.
Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givāgalepi ca.
Bhaṅgobhede paṭe bhaṅgaṃ, chattaṃtu chavakepi ca.
body.gatha1: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madanodume;
body.gatha2: vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī)vappo taṭepi ca;
